vconfkey.name: memory/data-provider-master/started
vconfkey.creator: Kyu-Ho Jo
vconfkey.comment: Notify to the clients whether the master service is started or not. if they recognize that the master is started, they will try to connect to master service

vconfkey.name: memory/private/data-provider-master/restart_count
vconfkey.comment: To count the recovery from fault of master service
